description: Data was loaded from the output of the GDC DNA methylation liftover workflow in November 2016. HG38 methylation data was loaded using the Methylation Liftover Pipeline. More details: see https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Bioinformatics_Pipelines/Methylation_LO_Pipeline

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX
fields.name: chromosome

fields.description: Genes is a field of type RECORD, mode REPEATED. Each of the possibly multiple records in this field has four components: genes.symbol, genes.type, genes, transcript_id, and genes.pos_to_TSS. Example of the contents of one record: genes.symbol = MIR1302-0, genes.type = miRNA, genes.transcript_id = ENST00000607096.1, genes.pos_to_TSS = -932
The symbol for genes associated with the CpG site. Genes that fall within 1,500 bp upstream of the transcription start site (TSS) to the end of the gene body are used.
fields.name: symbol

fields.description: A general classification for each gene (e.g. protein coding, miRNA, pseudogene)
fields.name: type

fields.description: Ensembl transcript IDs for each transcript associated with the genes detailed above
fields.name: transcript_id

fields.description: Distance in base pairs from the CpG site to each associated transcript's start site
fields.name: pos_to_TSS
genes

fields.description: CpG Island coordinates (base span) Example: chr1:28735-29737
fields.name: CpG_island_coord

fields.description: CpG islands / clusters (CGI) feature type. Examples: Island, null, S_Shelf, S_Shore
fields.name: CGI_feature_type
